#!/usr/bin/env python3 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- """ ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡åŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–°è„šæœ¬ åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæ ¹æ®top6æ’è¡Œæ¦œæ•°æ®åŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µçš„6ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡ æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ """ import json import re import os import shutil from datetime import datetime # é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ WEBCLICK_DIR = "/mnt/www/webclick" INDEX_FILE = "/mnt/www/index.html" BACKUP_DIR = "/home/main/site/backup" # é¡¹ç›®æè¿°æ˜ å°„ PROJECT_DESCRIPTIONS = { 'pr': "æ™ºèƒ½PRã€FAQã€æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§å†…å®¹åˆ›ä½œéœ€æ±‚", 'app': "æ™ºèƒ½PRã€FAQã€æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§å†…å®¹åˆ›ä½œéœ€æ±‚", # å…¼å®¹æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬ 'az': "åœ°å›¾ç»Ÿè®¡ã€åŒºåŸŸåˆ†æã€æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å·¥å…·", 'didi': "å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ã€ä¸šåŠ¡åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿ", 'pdf': "PDFæ–‡æ¡£å¤„ç†ã€è½¬æ¢ã€ç¼–è¾‘å·¥å…·", 'vote': "åœ¨çº¿æŠ•ç¥¨ã€é—®å·è°ƒæŸ¥ã€æ•°æ®æ”¶é›†å¹³å°", 'meet': "åœ¨çº¿ä¼šè®®ã€åä½œå·¥å…·ã€å›¢é˜Ÿæ²Ÿé€šå¹³å°", '6page': "å¿«é€Ÿç½‘é¡µç”Ÿæˆã€æ¨¡æ¿è®¾è®¡ã€å†…å®¹å‘å¸ƒå·¥å…·", 'dianbo': "åœ¨çº¿ç‚¹æ’­ã€åª’ä½“æ’­æ”¾ã€å†…å®¹åˆ†å‘å¹³å°" } # å¡ç‰‡é¢œè‰²ä¸»é¢˜ï¼ˆå¾ªç¯ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰ CARD_COLORS = [ "linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #45a049)", # ç»¿è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #2196F3, #1976D2)", # è“è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #FF9800, #F57C00)", # æ©™è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #d32f2f)", # çº¢è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #9C27B0, #7B1FA2)", # ç´«è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #607D8B, #455A64)" # ç°è“è‰² ] def load_top6_data(): """åŠ è½½æœ€æ–°çš„top6æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®""" top6_file = os.path.join(WEBCLICK_DIR, "latest_top6.json") if not os.path.exists(top6_file): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶: {top6_file}") with open(top6_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) return data def generate_card_html(item, index): """ç”Ÿæˆå•ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡çš„HTML""" # è§£ææ˜¾ç¤ºåç§° display_name = item['display_name'] parts = display_name.split(' ', 1) if len(parts) == 2: icon = parts[0] name = parts[1] else: icon = "ğŸ”§" name = display_name # è·å–é¡¹ç›®ä¿¡æ¯ short_name = item['short_name'] domain = item['domain'] url = item['url'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] # è·å–æè¿°å’Œé¢œè‰² description = PROJECT_DESCRIPTIONS.get(short_name, "ä¸“ä¸šå·¥å…·å¹³å°ï¼Œæä¾›é«˜æ•ˆçš„åœ¨çº¿æœåŠ¡") color = CARD_COLORS[index % len(CARD_COLORS)] # ç”ŸæˆHTML card_html = f'''
{icon}
{name}
{description}
{domain}
ğŸ“Š è¿‡å»7å¤©: {visits_7d:,} æ¬¡è®¿é—®
''' return card_html def update_homepage(top6_data): """æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ–‡ä»¶""" timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M') # æ£€æŸ¥ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ if not os.path.exists(INDEX_FILE): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶: {INDEX_FILE}") # åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½ os.makedirs(BACKUP_DIR, exist_ok=True) backup_file = os.path.join(BACKUP_DIR, f"index_backup_{timestamp}.html") shutil.copy2(INDEX_FILE, backup_file) print(f"å·²åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½: {backup_file}") # è¯»å–å½“å‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: content = f.read() # éªŒè¯å†…å®¹å®Œæ•´æ€§ if len(content) < 1000: # ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶åº”è¯¥æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§ raise ValueError("ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å·²æŸå") # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å†…å®¹ï¼ˆåŸºç¡€æ£€æµ‹ï¼‰ projects_grid_count = content.count('
') if projects_grid_count != 1: print(f"è­¦å‘Š: å‘ç° {projects_grid_count} ä¸ª projects-gridï¼Œå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å†…å®¹") if projects_grid_count > 1: print("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°é‡å¤å†…å®¹ï¼Œå°†ä½¿ç”¨æ¸…ç†æ¨¡å¼") # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¡ç‰‡HTML cards_html = [] for i, item in enumerate(top6_data['top6']): card = generate_card_html(item, i) cards_html.append(card) new_cards_section = "\n\n".join(cards_html) # ä½¿ç”¨æ›´ç²¾ç¡®çš„æ ‡è®°æ›¿æ¢é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ† # æ‰¾åˆ° projects-grid å¼€å§‹å’Œç»“æŸçš„ä½ç½® grid_start = '
' grid_start_pos = content.find(grid_start) if grid_start_pos == -1: print("é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ° projects-grid å¼€å§‹æ ‡è®°") return False # ä» grid_start_pos å¼€å§‹å¯»æ‰¾åŒ¹é…çš„ç»“æŸæ ‡è®° search_pos = grid_start_pos + len(grid_start) div_count = 1 # å·²ç»æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€å§‹çš„div grid_end_pos = -1 while search_pos < len(content) and div_count > 0: next_div_open = content.find('', search_pos) if next_div_close == -1: break if next_div_open != -1 and next_div_open < next_div_close: div_count += 1 search_pos = next_div_open + 4 else: div_count -= 1 if div_count == 0: grid_end_pos = next_div_close + 6 # åŒ…å«
break search_pos = next_div_close + 6 if grid_end_pos == -1: print("é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„ projects-grid ç»“æŸæ ‡è®°") return False # æ„å»ºæ–°å†…å®¹ new_content = ( content[:grid_start_pos + len(grid_start)] + f'\n{new_cards_section}\n ' + content[grid_end_pos:] ) if new_content == content: print("è­¦å‘Š: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯æ›¿æ¢çš„é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ†") return False # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°åçš„å†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(new_content) print("ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ!") return True def sync_to_s3(): """åŒæ­¥åˆ°S3å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœé…ç½®äº†s3cmdï¼‰""" if shutil.which('s3cmd'): print("åŒæ­¥ä¸»é¡µåˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶...") os.system(f"s3cmd put {INDEX_FILE} s3://www/index.html --acl-public") print("åŒæ­¥å®Œæˆ") else: print("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°s3cmdï¼Œè·³è¿‡å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶åŒæ­¥") def main(): """ä¸»å‡½æ•°""" print(f"å¼€å§‹æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") try: # åŠ è½½æ’è¡Œæ•°æ® data = load_top6_data() print(f"æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: {data['last_update']}") print("Top6æ’è¡Œ:") for item in data['top6']: rank = item['rank'] display_name = item['display_name'] domain = item['domain'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] print(f" {rank}. {display_name} - {visits_7d:,} æ¬¡è®¿é—® ({domain})") print() # æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µ if update_homepage(data): print("âœ… ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸï¼") # åŒæ­¥åˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ sync_to_s3() else: print("âŒ ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥") return 1 except Exception as e: print(f"âŒ æ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {e}") return 1 print(f"æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") print("---") return 0 if __name__ == "__main__": exit(main())

æ©™è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #d32f2f)", # çº¢è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #9C27B0, #7B1FA2)", # ç´«è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #607D8B, #455A64)" # ç°è“è‰² ] def load_top6_data(): """åŠ è½½æœ€æ–°çš„top6æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®""" top6_file = os.path.join(WEBCLICK_DIR, "latest_top6.json") if not os.path.exists(top6_file): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶: {top6_file}") with open(top6_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) return data def generate_card_html(item, index): """ç”Ÿæˆå•ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡çš„HTML""" # ') if projects_grid_count != 1: print(f"è­¦å‘Š: å‘ç° {projects_grid_count} ä¸ª projects-gridï¼Œå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å†…å®¹") if projects_grid_count > 1: print("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°é‡å¤å†…å®¹ï¼Œå°†ä½¿ç”¨æ¸…ç†æ¨¡å¼") # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¡ç‰‡HTML cards_html = [] for i, item in enumerate(top6_data['top6']): card = generate_card_html(item, i) cards_html.append(card) new_cards_section = "\n\n".join(cards_html) # ä½¿ç”¨æ›´ç²¾ç¡®çš„æ ‡è®°æ›¿æ¢é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ† # æ‰¾åˆ° projects-grid å¼€å§‹å’Œç»“æŸçš„ä½ç½® grid_start = '
' grid_start_pos = content.find(grid_start) if grid_start_pos == -1: print("é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ° projects-grid å¼€å§‹æ ‡è®°") return False # ä» grid_start_pos å¼€å§‹å¯»æ‰¾åŒ¹é…çš„ç»“æŸæ ‡è®° search_pos = grid_start_pos + len(grid_start) div_count = 1 # å·²ç»æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€å§‹çš„div grid_end_pos = -1 while search_pos < len(content) and div_count > 0: next_div_open = content.find('', search_pos) if next_div_close == -1: break if next_div_open != -1 and next_div_open < next_div_close: div_count += 1 search_pos = next_div_open + 4 else: div_count -= 1 if div_count == 0: grid_end_pos = next_div_close + 6 # åŒ…å«
break search_pos = next_div_close + 6 if grid_end_pos == -1: print("é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„ projects-grid ç»“æŸæ ‡è®°") return False # æ„å»ºæ–°å†…å®¹ new_content = ( content[:grid_start_pos + len(grid_start)] + f'\n{new_cards_section}\n ' + content[grid_end_pos:] ) if new_content == content: print("è­¦å‘Š: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯æ›¿æ¢çš„é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ†") return False # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°åçš„å†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(new_content) print("ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ!") return True def sync_to_s3(): """åŒæ­¥åˆ°S3å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœé…ç½®äº†s3cmdï¼‰""" if shutil.which('s3cmd'): print("åŒæ­¥ä¸»é¡µåˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶...") os.system(f"s3cmd put {INDEX_FILE} s3://www/index.html --acl-public") print("åŒæ­¥å®Œæˆ") else: print("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°s3cmdï¼Œè·³è¿‡å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶åŒæ­¥") def main(): """ä¸»å‡½æ•°""" print(f"å¼€å§‹æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") try: # åŠ è½½æ’è¡Œæ•°æ® data = load_top6_data() print(f"æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: {data['last_update']}") print("Top6æ’è¡Œ:") for item in data['top6']: rank = item['rank'] display_name = item['display_name'] domain = item['domain'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] print(f" {rank}. {display_name} - {visits_7d:,} æ¬¡è®¿é—® ({domain})") print() # æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µ if update_homepage(data): print("âœ… ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸï¼") # åŒæ­¥åˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ sync_to_s3() else: print("âŒ ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥") return 1 except Exception as e: print(f"âŒ æ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {e}") return 1 print(f"æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") print("---") return 0 if __name__ == "__main__": exit(main())

1â†’#!/bin/bash
     2â†’
     3â†’# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
     4â†’# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
     5â†’# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
     6â†’
     7â†’LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
     8â†’TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
     9â†’TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
    10â†’CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')
    11â†’
    12â†’# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
    13â†’declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
    14â†’for i in {0..6}; do
    15â†’    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    16â†’    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
    17â†’done
    18â†’
    19â†’# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
    20â†’mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"
    21â†’
    22â†’# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
    23â†’DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
    24â†’for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    25â†’    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
    26â†’        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    27â†’    fi
    28â†’    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
    29â†’done
    30â†’
    31â†’echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
    32â†’echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
    33â†’echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"
    34â†’
    35â†’# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
    36â†’count_main_domain_visits() {
    37â†’    local log_pattern="$1"
    38â†’    local total_count=0
    39â†’    
    40â†’    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    41â†’    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    42â†’        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
    43â†’        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
    44â†’        {
    45â†’            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
    46â†’            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
    47â†’                for (i in date_arr) {
    48â†’                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
    49â†’                        count++
    50â†’                        break
    51â†’                    }
    52â†’                }
    53â†’            }
    54â†’        }
    55â†’        END { print count }

   198â†’        case "$domain_name" in

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†pr.linapp.fun (AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·) 
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/pr.linapp.fun.access.log" ]] || [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - AIå·¥å…·åŸŸå: pr.linapp.fun"
    
    # å…ˆå°è¯•ä»ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
    pr_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "pr.linapp.fun")
    
    # å¦‚æœç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»ä¸»æ—¥å¿—ä¸­æå–/appè·¯å¾„è®¿é—®
    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "    (ä»ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„ç»Ÿè®¡)"
        pr_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
    fi
    
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|ğŸ¤– AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # è®¾ç½®åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç°æœ‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ï¼‰
        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top6_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top6_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

echo "Top6æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top6.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

æ©™è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #d32f2f)", # çº¢è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #9C27B0, #7B1FA2)", # ç´«è‰² "linear-gradient(45deg, #607D8B, #455A64)" # ç°è“è‰² ] def load_top6_data(): """åŠ è½½æœ€æ–°çš„top6æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®""" top6_file = os.path.join(WEBCLICK_DIR, "latest_top6.json") if not os.path.exists(top6_file): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ’è¡Œæ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶: {top6_file}") with open(top6_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) return data def generate_card_html(item, index): """ç”Ÿæˆå•ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡çš„HTML""" # ''' return card_html def update_homepage(top6_data): """æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ–‡ä»¶""" timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M') # æ£€æŸ¥ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ if not os.path.exists(INDEX_FILE): raise FileNotFoundError(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶: {INDEX_FILE}") # åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½ os.makedirs(BACKUP_DIR, exist_ok=True) backup_file = os.path.join(BACKUP_DIR, f"index_backup_{timestamp}.html") shutil.copy2(INDEX_FILE, backup_file) print(f"å·²åˆ›å»ºå¤‡ä»½: {backup_file}") # è¯»å–å½“å‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: content = f.read() # éªŒè¯å†…å®¹å®Œæ•´æ€§ if len(content) < 1000: # ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶åº”è¯¥æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§ raise ValueError("ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å·²æŸå") # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å†…å®¹ï¼ˆåŸºç¡€æ£€æµ‹ï¼‰ projects_grid_count = content.count('

break search_pos = next_div_close + 6 if grid_end_pos == -1: print("é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„ projects-grid ç»“æŸæ ‡è®°") return False # æ„å»ºæ–°å†…å®¹ new_content = ( content[:grid_start_pos + len(grid_start)] + f'\n{new_cards_section}\n ' + content[grid_end_pos:] ) if new_content == content: print("è­¦å‘Š: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯æ›¿æ¢çš„é¡¹ç›®å¡ç‰‡éƒ¨åˆ†") return False # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°åçš„å†…å®¹ with open(INDEX_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(new_content) print("ä¸»é¡µHTMLæ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ!") return True def sync_to_s3(): """åŒæ­¥åˆ°S3å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœé…ç½®äº†s3cmdï¼‰""" if shutil.which('s3cmd'): print("åŒæ­¥ä¸»é¡µåˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶...") os.system(f"s3cmd put {INDEX_FILE} s3://www/index.html --acl-public") print("åŒæ­¥å®Œæˆ") else: print("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°s3cmdï¼Œè·³è¿‡å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶åŒæ­¥") def main(): """ä¸»å‡½æ•°""" print(f"å¼€å§‹æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") try: # åŠ è½½æ’è¡Œæ•°æ® data = load_top6_data() print(f"æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: {data['last_update']}") print("Top6æ’è¡Œ:") for item in data['top6']: rank = item['rank'] display_name = item['display_name'] domain = item['domain'] visits_7d = item['visits_7d'] print(f" {rank}. {display_name} - {visits_7d:,} æ¬¡è®¿é—® ({domain})") print() # æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µ if update_homepage(data): print("âœ… ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸï¼") # åŒæ­¥åˆ°å­˜å‚¨æ¡¶ sync_to_s3() else: print("âŒ ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥") return 1 except Exception as e: print(f"âŒ æ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {e}") return 1 print(f"æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ - {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}") print("---") return 0 if __name__ == "__main__": exit(main())

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†pr.linapp.fun (AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·) 
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/pr.linapp.fun.access.log" ]] || [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - AIå·¥å…·åŸŸå: pr.linapp.fun"
    
    # å…ˆå°è¯•ä»ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
    pr_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "pr.linapp.fun")
    
    # å¦‚æœç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»ä¸»æ—¥å¿—ä¸­æå–/appè·¯å¾„è®¿é—®
    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "    (ä»ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„ç»Ÿè®¡)"
        pr_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
    fi
    
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|ğŸ¤– AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆ"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # è®¾ç½®åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç°æœ‰ä¸»é¡µå†…å®¹ï¼‰
        case "$domain_name" in
            "az.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®åˆ†æ" ;;
            "didi.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ‘¥ å®¢æˆ·ç®¡ç†" ;;
            "pdf.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“„ PDFå·¥å…·" ;;
            "vote.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ—³ï¸ æŠ•ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            "meet.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“± ä¼šè®®å·¥å…·" ;;
            "6page.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“‹ å…­é¡µåº”ç”¨" ;;
            "dianbo.linapp.fun") display_name="ğŸ“» ç‚¹æ’­ç³»ç»Ÿ" ;;
            *) display_name="ğŸ”§ ${domain_name%%.*}" ;;
        esac
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false

    ((rank++))

echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶

find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top6æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top6_file="$TARGET_DIR/top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top6_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top6_file"
echo "  \"top6\": [" >> "$top6_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top6_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top6_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

echo "Top6æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top6_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top6.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top6_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬

# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"

echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '

            {

                    }
                }
            }

            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi

        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {

                    }
                }
            }

}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†pr.linapp.fun (AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·) 
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/pr.linapp.fun.access.log" ]] || [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - AIå·¥å…·åŸŸå: pr.linapp.fun"
    
    # å…ˆå°è¯•ä»ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
    pr_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "pr.linapp.fun")
    
    # å¦‚æœç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»ä¸»æ—¥å¿—ä¸­æå–/appè·¯å¾„è®¿é—®
    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "    (ä»ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„ç»Ÿè®¡)"
        pr_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
    fi
    
    # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–pråŸŸåä¿¡æ¯
    pr_display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "pr.linapp.fun")
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|$pr_display_name"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯
        display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "$domain_name")
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥åŸŸåæ˜¯å¦è¢«ç¦ç”¨
        if [[ "$display_name" == "DISABLED" ]]; then
            echo "    (å·²ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡)"
            continue
        fi
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top7æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top7_file="$TARGET_DIR/top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top7_file"

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 6 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then

    else

    fi

    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top6_file"

    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top6_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top6_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top6_file"

done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"
echo "}" >> "$top6_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"

    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶

        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '

                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {

                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then

    pr_display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "pr.linapp.fun")
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|$pr_display_name"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯
        display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "$domain_name")

        if [[ "$display_name" == "DISABLED" ]]; then

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº

sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"

echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do

    fi

    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"

    ((rank++))

echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

top7_file="$TARGET_DIR/top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json"

    else

    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top7_file"

echo "  ]" >> "$top6_file"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""

echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top6.json"
echo "---"

    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then

count_main_domain_visits() {

    for i in {1..7}; do

                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi
    DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK$pattern"
done

echo "å¼€å§‹å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ - $(date)"
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´: è¿‡å»7å¤©"
echo "æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: ${DATE_PATTERNS[6]} è‡³ ${DATE_PATTERNS[0]}"

# ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°
count_main_domain_visits() {
    local log_pattern="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
            if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                for (i in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.1, .2, .3ç­‰ï¼‰
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

echo "å‘ç°çš„åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š"

# 1. å¤„ç†pr.linapp.fun (AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·) 
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/pr.linapp.fun.access.log" ]] || [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - AIå·¥å…·åŸŸå: pr.linapp.fun"
    
    # å…ˆå°è¯•ä»ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
    pr_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "pr.linapp.fun")
    
    # å¦‚æœç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»ä¸»æ—¥å¿—ä¸­æå–/appè·¯å¾„è®¿é—®
    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "    (ä»ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„ç»Ÿè®¡)"
        pr_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
    fi
    
    # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–pråŸŸåä¿¡æ¯
    pr_display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "pr.linapp.fun")
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|$pr_display_name"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯
        display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "$domain_name")
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥åŸŸåæ˜¯å¦è¢«ç¦ç”¨
        if [[ "$display_name" == "DISABLED" ]]; then
            echo "    (å·²ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡)"
            continue
        fi
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top7æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top7_file="$TARGET_DIR/top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top7_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"top7\": [" >> "$top7_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 7 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top7_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top7_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top7_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top7_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top7_file"
echo "}" >> "$top7_file"

echo "Top7æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top7_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top7.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top7_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top7.json"
echo "---"

                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "$LOG_DIR/access.log.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                match($0, /"[A-Z]+ ([^ ]+) HTTP/, path_arr)
                if (path_arr[1] ~ /^\/app/) {
                    for (j in date_arr) {
                        if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                            count++
                            break
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# ç»Ÿè®¡äºŒçº§åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡çš„å‡½æ•°  
count_subdomain_visits() {
    local domain_name="$1"
    local total_count=0
    
    # å¤„ç†å½“å‰æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    log_file="$LOG_DIR/${domain_name}.access.log"
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
        BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
        {
            for (i in date_arr) {
                if (index($0, date_arr[i]) > 0) {
                    count++
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        END { print count }
        ' "$log_file")
        total_count=$((total_count + count))
    fi
    
    # å¤„ç†è½®è½¬çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
    for i in {1..7}; do
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i" ]]; then
            count=$(awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }
            ' "${log_file}.$i")
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
        
        # å¤„ç†å‹ç¼©çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
        if [[ -f "${log_file}.$i.gz" ]]; then
            count=$(zcat "${log_file}.$i.gz" | awk -v patterns="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" '
            BEGIN { count = 0; split(patterns, date_arr, "|") }
            {
                for (j in date_arr) {
                    if (index($0, date_arr[j]) > 0) {
                        count++
                        break
                    }
                }
            }
            END { print count }')
            total_count=$((total_count + count))
        fi
    done
    
    echo $total_count
}

# åŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
declare -A domain_stats
domain_count=0

# 1. å¤„ç†pr.linapp.fun (AIå†…å®¹ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·) 
if [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/pr.linapp.fun.access.log" ]] || [[ -f "$LOG_DIR/access.log" ]]; then
    echo "  - AIå·¥å…·åŸŸå: pr.linapp.fun"
    
    # å…ˆå°è¯•ä»ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
    pr_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "pr.linapp.fun")
    
    # å¦‚æœç‹¬ç«‹æ—¥å¿—æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»ä¸»æ—¥å¿—ä¸­æå–/appè·¯å¾„è®¿é—®
    if [[ $pr_count -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "    (ä»ä¸»åŸŸå/appè·¯å¾„ç»Ÿè®¡)"
        pr_count=$(count_main_domain_visits)
    fi
    
    # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–pråŸŸåä¿¡æ¯
    pr_display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "pr.linapp.fun")
    domain_stats["pr|pr.linapp.fun|$pr_display_name"]="$pr_count"
    ((domain_count++))
fi

# 2. å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸå
for log_file in $(find "$LOG_DIR" -name "*.linapp.fun.access.log" 2>/dev/null | sort); do
    if [[ -f "$log_file" ]]; then
        domain_name=$(basename "$log_file" .access.log)
        echo "  - äºŒçº§åŸŸå: $domain_name"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡
        visit_count=$(count_subdomain_visits "$domain_name")
        
        # ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·å–åŸŸåæ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯
        display_name=$(/home/main/scripts/get_domain_config.py display_name "$domain_name")
        echo "    è°ƒè¯•: $domain_name -> '$display_name'"
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥åŸŸåæ˜¯å¦è¢«ç¦ç”¨
        if [[ "$display_name" == "DISABLED" ]]; then
            echo "    (å·²ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡)"
            continue
        fi
        
        domain_stats["${domain_name%%.*}|$domain_name|$display_name"]="$visit_count"
        ((domain_count++))
    fi
done

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±å‘ç° $domain_count ä¸ªåŸŸå"
echo ""

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’åº
echo "æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œï¼š"
echo "æ’å | åŸŸå | 7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡"
echo "----|------|----------"

# åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
temp_file="/tmp/domain_ranking_$$.txt"
> "$temp_file"

for key in "${!domain_stats[@]}"; do
    count="${domain_stats[$key]}"
    echo "$count|$key" >> "$temp_file"
done

# æŒ‰è®¿é—®é‡é™åºæ’åº
sort -t'|' -k1,1nr "$temp_file" > "${temp_file}_sorted"

# ç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œå’ŒJSONæ–‡ä»¶
ranking_file="$TARGET_DIR/ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"total_domains\": $domain_count," >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  \"ranking\": [" >> "$ranking_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name; do
    printf "%2d   | %-20s | %8s\n" "$rank" "$display_name" "$count"
    
    # æ·»åŠ åˆ°JSON
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$ranking_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top7æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top7_file="$TARGET_DIR/top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top7_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"top7\": [" >> "$top7_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 7 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top7_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top7_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top7_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top7_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top7_file"
echo "}" >> "$top7_file"

echo "Top7æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top7_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top7.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top7_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top7.json"
echo "---"

#!/bin/bash

# å…¨åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ’è¡Œè„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šåŠ¨æ€å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§åŸŸåï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©è®¿é—®é‡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ’è¡Œæ¦œ
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

LOG_DIR="/var/log/nginx"
TARGET_DIR="/mnt/www/webclick"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')
CURRENT_HOUR=$(date '+%H')

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ¨¡å¼
declare -a DATE_PATTERNS
for i in {0..6}; do
    day_pattern=$(date -d "$i days ago" '+%d/%b/%Y')
    DATE_PATTERNS+=("$day_pattern")
done

# ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"

# åˆ›å»ºç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´çš„AWKæ¨¡å¼
DATE_PATTERN_AWK=""
for pattern in "${DATE_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    if [[ -n "$DATE_PATTERN_AWK" ]]; then
        DATE_PATTERN_AWK="$DATE_PATTERN_AWK|"
    fi

    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$ranking_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count" >> "$ranking_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$ranking_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$ranking_file"
echo "}" >> "$ranking_file"

echo ""
echo "æ’è¡Œæ¦œå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $ranking_file"

# ç”Ÿæˆä¸“é—¨çš„Top7æ–‡ä»¶ä¾›ä¸»é¡µä½¿ç”¨
top7_file="$TARGET_DIR/top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json"
echo "{" > "$top7_file"
echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"last_update\": \"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"period\": \"7d\"," >> "$top7_file"
echo "  \"top7\": [" >> "$top7_file"

rank=1
first=true

while IFS='|' read -r count short_name full_domain display_name && [[ $rank -le 7 ]]; do
    if [[ "$first" == "true" ]]; then
        first=false
    else
        echo "    ," >> "$top7_file"
    fi
    
    echo "    {" >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"rank\": $rank," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"short_name\": \"$short_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"domain\": \"$full_domain\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"display_name\": \"$display_name\"," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"visits_7d\": $count," >> "$top7_file"
    echo "      \"url\": \"$(if [[ $full_domain == *"/app"* ]]; then echo "/app"; else echo "https://$full_domain"; fi)\"" >> "$top7_file"
    echo -n "    }" >> "$top7_file"
    
    ((rank++))
done < "${temp_file}_sorted"

echo "" >> "$top7_file"
echo "  ]" >> "$top7_file"
echo "}" >> "$top7_file"

echo "Top7æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: $top7_file"

# åˆ›å»ºlatesté“¾æ¥æŒ‡å‘æœ€æ–°æ–‡ä»¶
ln -sf "ranking_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_ranking.json"
ln -sf "top7_${TIMESTAMP}.json" "$TARGET_DIR/latest_top7.json"

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f "$temp_file" "${temp_file}_sorted"

# æ¸…ç†7å¤©å‰çš„æ—§æ–‡ä»¶
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "ranking_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$TARGET_DIR" -name "top7_*.json" -mtime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ - $(date)"
echo "æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®: latest_ranking.json, latest_top7.json"
echo "---"

#!/bin/bash

# æ¯å°æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°è„šæœ¬
# åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šç»Ÿè®¡åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œ â†’ æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡ â†’ åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®
# æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼šæ¯å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ï¼ˆæ•´ç‚¹ï¼‰

SCRIPT_DIR="/home/main/scripts"
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M')

# åˆ›å»ºæ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

# æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
HOURLY_LOG="$LOG_DIR/hourly_update.log"

echo "=====================================" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
echo "å¼€å§‹æ¯å°æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–° - $(date)" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
echo "=====================================" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"

# 1. æ‰§è¡ŒåŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡
echo "æ­¥éª¤1: ç»Ÿè®¡åŸŸåè®¿é—®é‡æ’è¡Œ" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
if "$SCRIPT_DIR/domain_stats_ranking.sh" >> "$HOURLY_LOG" 2>&1; then
    echo "âœ… åŸŸåç»Ÿè®¡å®Œæˆ" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
else
    echo "âŒ åŸŸåç»Ÿè®¡å¤±è´¥" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"

fi

# ç­‰å¾…2ç§’ç¡®ä¿æ–‡ä»¶å·²ç”Ÿæˆ
sleep 2

# 2. æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡  
echo "æ­¥éª¤2: æ›´æ–°ä¸»é¡µå¡ç‰‡" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
if python3 "$SCRIPT_DIR/update_homepage_simple.py" >> "$HOURLY_LOG" 2>&1; then
    echo "âœ… ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
else
    echo "âŒ ä¸»é¡µæ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"

fi

# 3. è®°å½•å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€
echo "âœ… æ¯å°æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ - $(date)" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"
echo "" >> "$HOURLY_LOG"

# ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘30å¤©çš„æ—¥å¿—
find "$LOG_DIR" -name "hourly_update.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null || true

echo "è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ"
